resources.string:
SIM subscriber name "%s" DOES NOT MATCH with your full name "%s" entered in this app.
 Please, ensure that you have entered correct full name in this app to use this feature properly.
 Nepal Telecommunication Authority (NTA) requests everyone to register the SIM in their own name.
 Click this link for more info : https://www.gadgetbytenepal.com/how-to-change-sim-card-ownership
The name entered here will be used to personalize the app and to check whether the SIM is registered in your name or not.
HI STRANGER,\nWe would like to know your full name

You need to enable accessibility service to allow this application to parse and cache SIM details such as phone number and balance. However, you can choose to ignore this for now and enable intuitive mode in the settings later if you want to test this feature.

You need to grant this permission to allow this app to show overlay on top of the USSD response dialog to show custom loading dialog which is intended to improve the user experience. However, you can choose to ignore this for now and enable intuitive mode in the settings later if you want to test this feature.
